00018   TriggerProcessorBase::TriggerProcessorBase(const std::string &processor_name) 
00019     : Processor(processor_name) 
00020 #ifdef TRIGGER_HANDLER_IS_SINGLETON
00021 #else
00022     , _theTrigHandler(new CALICE::TriggerHandlerCalice)
00023 #endif
00024   {
00025     _description = "Processor to add Trigger information on CALICE data to the event";
00026     //some steering parameters 
00027     //trigger assignment
00028     registerProcessorParameter( "Trigger_Assignment" , 
00029                               "Name of the Collection for the Trigger Assignment"  ,
00030                                 _col_trigger_assignment ,
00031                                std::string(COL_TRIGGER_ASSIGNMENT) ) ;
00032 
00033 
00034     //Parameters to be passed to the triggerhandler
00035     //trigger configuration collection 
00036     registerProcessorParameter( "Trigger_Check" , 
00037                               "Name of the Collection for the Trigger Check"  ,
00038                                 _col_trigger_check,
00039                                std::string(COL_TRIGGER_CHECK) ) ;
00040 
00041     //trigger configuration collection 
00042     registerProcessorParameter( "BE_Trigger_Configuration" , 
00043                               "Name of the conditions collection for the BE trigger configuration"  ,
00044                                 _colBeTrgConf,
00045                                std::string(COL_TRIGGER_CONF) ) ;
00046 
00047     //readout configuration collection 
00048     registerProcessorParameter( "Readout_Configuration" , 
00049                               "Name of the conditions collection for the readout configuration"  ,
00050                                 _colNameReadoutConf,
00051                                std::string(COL_RO_CONF) ) ;
00052 
00053     //readout configuration collection 
00054     registerProcessorParameter( "TrgReadout_Configuration" , 
00055                               "Name of the conditions collection for the trigger readout configuration"  ,
00056                                 _colNameTrgReadoutConf,
00057                                std::string(COL_TRGRO_CONF) ) ;
00058 
00059     _colNameFeConf.clear();
00060     _colNameFeConf.push_back(COL_EMC_FE_CONF);
00061     _colNameFeConf.push_back(COL_AHC_FE_CONF);
00062 
00063     registerProcessorParameter( "FE_Configuration" , 
00064                               "List of names of the conditions collection for the FE configuration (CALDAQ_EmcFeConfiguration, CALDAQ_AhcFeConfiguration)." ,
00065                                 _colNameFeConf,
00066                                 _colNameFeConf);
00067 
00068     
00069     registerProcessorParameter( "TriggerConfigurationName" , 
00070                                 "Name of the event parameter which will be filled with the current trigger configuration bits."  ,
00071                                 _parNameTriggerConf ,
00072                                 std::string(PAR_TRIGGER_CONF) ) ;
00073 
00074     registerProcessorParameter( "TriggerAndEnableName" , 
00075                                 "Name of the event parameter which will be filled with the current enabled trigger bits."  ,
00076                                 _parNameTriggerAndEnable ,
00077                                 std::string(PAR_TRIGGER_ANDENABLE) ) ;
00078 
00079     registerProcessorParameter( "TriggerEventName" , 
00080                                 "Name of the event parameter which will be filled with the current trigger event bits."  ,
00081                                 _parNameTriggerEvent ,
00082                                 std::string(PAR_TRIGGER_EVENT) ) ;
00083 
00084     registerProcessorParameter( "ColTriggerEventName" , 
00085                                 "Collection name of trigger event data."  ,
00086                                 _colNameTriggerEvent ,
00087                                 std::string(COL_FETRG) ) ;
00088 
00089     _colNameModuleConnection.clear();
00090     _colNameModuleConnection.push_back("EmcModuleConnection");
00091     _colNameModuleConnection.push_back("AhcModuleConnection");
00092 
00093     registerProcessorParameter( "ModuleConnectionCollectionName" , 
00094                                 "List of names of the conditions data collection which describes the connection between modules and the DAQ front-ends."  ,
00095                                 _colNameModuleConnection,
00096                                 _colNameModuleConnection);
00097 
00098 
00099 
00100 }

00103  TriggerProcessorBase::~TriggerProcessorBase() {
00104 #ifdef TRIGGER_HANDLER_IS_SINGLETON
00105 #else
00106    delete _theTrigHandler;
00107 #endif  
00108  }
00109 
00110   void TriggerProcessorBase::init() {
00111      //Some initialization
00112     printParameters();
00113 
00114     //Initialize the TriggerHandler
00115 #ifdef TRIGGER_HANDLER_IS_SINGLETON
00116     _theTrigHandler = TriggerHandlerCalice::getInstance();
00117 #endif
00118 
00119     _theTrigHandler->init( _col_trigger_assignment, _col_trigger_check, _colBeTrgConf, _colNameReadoutConf, _colNameTrgReadoutConf, _colNameFeConf, _colNameModuleConnection);
00120     _theTrigHandler->setColNameTriggerEvent( _colNameTriggerEvent );
00121 
00122 }
